content.detailedDescription: I was on a bus on my way to a truck driving school in cedar hills from waxahachice tx. well i thought it was strange there was a blinp floating over the tower at that hieght im always looking up to watch planes fly dont know know why but as we became straight across from it and i got aa good look it i realized the shape and none movement of it wasnt a blimp , these vessels were long they looked like they were aboutat least 1/2 mile in length and they just sat there after staring at them i remembered i had my camera so i took a picture and it didnt turn out that great but you can see the out line. i showed 3 other guys the vessel just floating there no up or down movement it sat steady. then they looked like they just melted into the sky they just dissapered. i'm not crazy i hope.I have had 3 other experiences around buna texas and never said nothing before because i never had any proof to back it up. thank you for your time you have yet another sighting that we can't explain.It was exciting yet scarey ya know.
content.summary: It was huge hovering over a communication tower that is probly 400' high

content.detailedDescription:
I saw what looked to be 5 or 6 lights in the sky just around dusk on the evening of tue. may 15th in chester county pa. i've never seen anything like that before in the area or any where else. it was hard too get a good look with the trees. they looked to be low and some what large. as i moved to an area to get a better look they looked smaller and moved behind clouds. 

i did get a short video but i only saw 2 lights at the point and the video was onle able to get 1.
content.summary: Saw odd lights in pattern in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I saw what looked to be 5 or 6 lights in the sky just around dusk on the evening of tue. may 15th in chester county pa. i've never seen anything like that before in the area or any where else. it was hard too get a good look with the trees. they looked to be low and some what large. as i moved to an area to get a better look they looked smaller and moved behind clouds. 

i did get a short video but i only saw 2 lights at the point and the video was onle able to get 1.
content.summary: Saw odd lights in pattern in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Saw two reddish glowing balloon shaped objects about 5 minutes apart that appeared from beyond a row of houses a little above treetops in the neighborhood a distance of about two miles.  objects slowly climbed to an altitude of about 300 ft and each illuminated for about 6 minutes and 15 seconds before disappearing.  the path they took was exactly the same.  objects were bright enough to be a flare, but did not arc nor travel the same as a flare.  video was taken with a cell phone but is not distinguishable after the event.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Glowing balloon like object hovering then slowly ascending

content.detailedDescription: I was inside my house playing on my computer it was about 2am-3am i was waiting the game to load i looked out the window and there it was a bright ball of light a bit smaller than the sun in the sky over the treeline i imidietly thought it was an ufo i saw it for about 1min it was moving pretty fast back and forth it was like i allready told a ball of light a bit smaller then the sun in the sky it like went up and down very litle and back and forth i got so scared i thought it would land in the forrest and come to my house my hands and legs shaked i kept saying to myslef "nothing to worry jst my imagination" but im 110% sure i didnt imagine it and after a minute it disapeared behind the tree line and i didnt see it again after that.
content.summary: Bright ball of light

content.detailedDescription: Saw something strange in the sky on night of may 16th around 10:30pm in preble county ohio. noticed sky was really clear & lots of stars out, then saw that one was moving. thought at first it was probably a high plane, figured just high enough that i couldn't see any blinking lights. then i noticed this white light was getting brighter as if coming my direction. suddenly the speed increased, then instantly it vanished. there were no clouds at all for it to hide behind, it just seemed to disappear instantly.
content.summary: Star like object that vanished instantly

content.detailedDescription:
I couldn't sleep, so i went outside to have a cigarette. after a phone call from a friend i was stargazing and noticed one of the stars changing colors. knowing that this wasn't natural i continued to follow it and it began to move and change colors. it started moving in a circular, clockwise pattern and then stopped for about five minutes until it began moving backwards and forwards on one straight path. it then broke off into three shapes that formed a triangle formation and followed the same straight path. after that the shape re-consolidated itself and began the circular pattern. it then shot off at high speed, leaving behind a bright purple trail that then slowly dissipated after about thirty seconds.

it is to be noted i also saw two shooting stars that were bright green in the same area of the sky.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Color-changing, star-like anomaly

content.detailedDescription: The date is very approximate.  after arriving home on a sunday afternoon i was talking with 2 family members who were on the driveway with me.  i noticed something glinting in the sky to the east.  we have a lot of commercial air traffic overhead in this area since we are under the path that many planes take up and down the atlantic coast and at first i thought it was a low flying passenger jet, but the glint was stronger than those planes produce.  it was  much lower than passenger jets in this area. i noticed that there weren't any wings and there was a wide black band that went around the circumference at a point slightly less than halfway from the from the front of the cylinder. i still thought it might be an airplane whose wings were not visible because the way the sun was hitting it so i watched as it made it's progress  and it was clear that it was not an airplane since it did not have wings, tail, or any tapering of any kind.  i could not tell if the ends, which were not tapered, were open or closed.  there was a passenger jet flying above and in front of the object, and slightly farther away from me. both were flying  straight north.  the distance between the object and the airplane remained the same during the siting. the passenger jet was flying lower than those we usually see here. there was another passnger jet that was much farther away and much higher that follwed these two, but were all visible at the same time. other planes came and went in the busy sun. afternoon sky shortly afterwards. the cylinder was shorter and fatter in proportion when compared to the passenger jet fuselage that i saw but seemed to be approximately the same size. i regret that tall trees blocked my view after about 10-15 seconds.  my relatives wanted to know what i was looking at, but i just shook my head as if to say nothing because i didn't want to spend my time trying to explain while i could still see it and try to figure out what it could be.  afterwards  i think i may have said i had seen something like an airplane without wings and tried not to make a big deal of it.  i wanted to keep thinking about what it could be and didn't want to be distracted by kidding.  thoughts---somehow it looked "normal".  i didn't look menacing.  could it be some kind of device for photographing large areas, with the dark band being a dark "plastic" shield around cameras much like security cameras in stores have dark plastic looking covers?  how did it get it's lift and propulsion?  was an airfoil inside the "tube"?  was it a lighter than air device with a propeller inside the "tube"?  why did it seem to be shadowing a fairly low flying passenger plane? perhaps what looked like a passenger plane was really military? was that plane perhaps an escort, but why would an escort be in front? was it really above 500ft or under?  could civil and military radar detect it?  surely some of the planes in the busy sky had seen it.  there are several airforce and naval air bases within 150 miles and no apparent military planes were checking it out.  a nuclear submarine base is not too far away.  i can only imagine that the skies are watched closely in this area.
content.summary: Daytime cylinder with dark band

content.detailedDescription:
Well, i walked outside to take care of some personal stuff at around midnight or so. i looked overhead and i saw these strange blinking lights. [white and pinkish colors that were pulsating.]

i definitely saw one ufo at first. because it was hovering there for about an hour or so. but sometimes it would move abruptly about 10 to 50 feet.

it would just sit there and act like a star at first, and it would just stay still in the sky for about 10 to 20 minutes or so in duration, hovering....Then it started to hum a bit when it moved in a slow hover.

i noticed it was blinking some sort of code. there were planes flying by this light that was moving just a bit. then i noticed that there was another blinking light it was communicating with, a lower set ufo slightly above the tree-lines.

i know planes don't do that! stay still for a length of time, then move a bit in the skies, then stay still again. it did that quite a few times. well both of these "crafts" did that. 

there were actually planes that flew by it...Night pilots. but i noticed these planes were not paying any attention to these strange lights.

i could not take a clear picture, because my camera is not great with night pictures. but it was obviously a couple of spacecrafts from "somewhere out there"!

it was strange for me seeing this. most certainly!
content.summary: 2 blinking ufos over the lee's summit area

content.detailedDescription:
This is always my least favourite part, excuse the cynicism. i guess i mean that i always find it difficult to describe a scenario so that someone understands how fantastic the event is as my experience; i'm a scientist, and a graduate nurse, and therefore trained to observe and report. however, there's more to a good story than just the facts, so, i'll do my best to make sense of this experience so somebody will enjoy reading this.

every morning and some afternoons i take my 18 month old son for a walk around my neighbourhood, of which includes ring drive (in groton ct). my son has a thing for air-planes and loves to sky-watch, so, i often spend time looking up into the sky with him during our walks. this time, my son pointed at a plane and then i saw an object dangerously close to the plane, it seemed like the plane didn't see the object, as it didn't alter course or anything; i believe the object may have been on the periphery or in back of the plane, hence no change in course. at that moment i whipped out my video camera like "billy the kid" and started to video the craft, i didn't get much taping done and the object was gone, at that point i closed the video camera and sighed with disgust because i could not get a better video. then, out of the blue, totally unexpected another craft comes from another direction, this time closer and more discernible. it is totally possible that it could be the same same craft just closer, it was more difficult to make out the size and shape of the first one especially because of the brightness of the sky. however, the second video was shot at a closer distance and i was able to make out more details, this is supported by my less than perfect narration, i did just blurt out the details as the video plays reinforcing my memory and this description. i will say again, the object was circular/spherical and moving around in an unnatural way. and, as you can see in the video, the object just moved out of view.

it should be noted that this is my second mufon report. but, these to craft don't resemble the last two in the very least. in my opinion, the video quality and duration trump the video from the last report for the following reasons: a)the video camera was a 1080p (without zoom)vs a 720p from the last report, so, i think the object can be better discerned especially after digital zoom is applied. b) this was my second experience & i was not anxious and as jittery as the first video. c) lastly, there are objects in the foreground so a distance and size should be easier to figure out. by no means am i discounting my last experience, in fact i stated before that this area (groton ct) is a hot spot because of the sub base, general dynamics (electric boat), the air national guard, and lastly the airport. when i first came to the area a few people had mentioned the weird shapes and lights in the sky and i dismissed them all until i saw a bunch things in the sky that i could not understand myself. it is of my opinion that these ufo's and such are extraterrestrial in nature and have been occurring for quite some time now. and furthermore, it is also my opinion that these craft seemed interested in our military (especially nuclear) technology, commercial aircraft, and our developing tech (general dynamics).

i hope that everyone reading this got a good understanding of what happened to me on may 11th 2012. thanks for reading my report.
content.summary: Two disctinctly different ufo's spotted in the groton ct area again!!

content.detailedDescription: Cousin and i were hanging out at froggys pizza and we saw a large almost round object move over us right over the building. it had a humming sound and flashing lights on it. dont remember getting home but remember standing in back yard watching it with my dad ,cousin and her parents while it hovered over us then shot straight up very fast and hovered for awhile then shot at an angle straight out of the sky and disappeared. the next day they reported it as a weather balloon. i know it was not the way it moved and followed us for at least 4 blocks.
content.summary: Unknown large object hovered over us and followed us

content.detailedDescription: Was inside of my house on the computer at approximately 1:45pm on may 17 2012. i heard the sound of a low level jet. i like taking pictures of low flying planes over my house. so i grabbed my camera fast and went outside. facing south west from my yard in north manchester, i noticed an a-10 flying to the west from the east. i took a quick picture with my camera and put the camera down..Then i noticed 3 white balls going the same direction as the plane. they didnt really didnt look like they were following the plane..But it was the same direction..East to west. the balls were at an angle. after seeing this very quickly..I went to switch my camera to video..Looked back up...And didnt see the a-10 or white balls. the whole experience lasted maybe 3 or 4 seconds. weather was clear and temp. was 77 degrees. im not sure if these were ufo's or maybe something the a-10 had done..But thought i would report it. i did get lucky and caught the balls on my digital camera.
content.summary: White balls

content.detailedDescription: About 1:00 a.M. last night (may 17, 2012) i was preparing to go to work. i live in farmington new mexico, near the four corners (nm, co, az, & ut). the sky was clear, and very dark because the small crescent moon hadn't yet risen. my house faces south, and i walked out my front door to the driveway and stopped in front of my garage when a movement in the sky caught my eye. facing southward, i looked up and saw a very large dark triangular-shaped object gliding ominously towards me & over me.  the object passed directly over me, heading due north. as soon as it had passed overhead it was out of my view, since my garage and house blocked my view. the sighting only lasted about 3 seconds or less. the object was gliding along very smoothly and rapidly. i felt a creepy feeling, like a chill up my spine. it had a powerful presence, like a predator. i'm over 50 and this is my first ufo sighting. as soon as i saw it, i knew it was a ufo since there was no sound at all. it was eerie. i immediately went back inside and told some of my family members what i had just seen. then i went back out and looked all around the sky but couldn't see any sign of it. by then it was probably several miles away, since it was moving at a steady, smooth pace, probably about a mile every 10 seconds. the size of it was so large, that a basketball held at arm's length would just barely have covered it. it could have been a top-secret spy drone or something, but i don't think our government has something that could fly that silently, with no sign of a propulsion system. it blended in with the stars and the night sky so well, that someone driving in a car probably wouldn't have noticed it.
content.summary: Large triangular-shaped object gliding silently, passed right over me

content.detailedDescription:
We were sitting in our backyard by the pool with all the outside lights on. i was looking up at the sky when i saw an orange, redish oval shape object coming toward us from the sw. when it got close it slowed from about 30mph to a hover and then started moving on towards the ne. i immediatly told my wife to look up and called for my daughter. then three more of the same kind of objects came from the same direction on similar individual flight paths. all objects were totally silent which was very strange to me. more and more came in groups of one to three (total of about 12 objects). 
at first i though it might be a plane or helicopter but then as it closed in i could clearly see it was neither and totally silent. objects seemed to know eachothers fligh paths but moved independently the whole time. all were the same glowing coloration.
i was clam but excited to see this and felt fine the entire encounter. all of the objects moved ne at different times. some in groups and some independently.
in my video they appear to be in a triangle but they were actually moving at slightly different speeds and moved individually.
content.summary: One object came toward us and then moved on; then three objects and then more. all had individual flight paths but similar direction. moving at about 20 or 30 mph from sw to ne. they were silent and appeared to be glowing orange, red and yellow.

content.detailedDescription: Two people in car at first thought i saw lightning at a distance , then passenger saw same. noticed at that time the light (dim at this time) was seen over hill and was pulsing. kept getting brighter til we eventually started around a curve and spotted it .Very large in size hovering over parking lot. view was momentarily blocked by hillside.By the time we could get clear view it was gone. then we again spotted it at the treeline about a half mile down road. stationary, pulsing ,extremely bright white light. appeared circular. i stopped car to look, it never moved. i tried to take video with cellphone, but it wouldn't show clearly. just a white dot on screen. got back in car and drove on while passenger watched out the window , it seemed to move a little but not much. when i arrived home a short distance later i could still see the flasing that i first saw over the hill. this lasted for an hour or more. i wanted to go back with a regular camera and see if i could get clear video. i suppose fear of the unknown and the fact i would have been alone in doing this stopped me. we both just kept saying the obvious- "what is that?" over and over. i tried to tell myself that it was military, but why would they take the chance to draw so much attention? if someone has an explanation i would love to hear a logical one. side note- i travel this road every night from work so i wll be watching and carrying a camera.
content.summary: Happened around at midnight , travelling on route 3 towards inez

content.detailedDescription:
In town of ruskin at a resort. noticed 3 bright unusual lights over tampa bay that hadn't been there earlier in night or on other nights. my wife and i saw them while outside hotel so i went to room and filmed them from the balcony. have no idea what they were. there is an airport nearby i believe but these lights stayed pretty much in one area above the bay most of the time (at least 30 minutes).

i dont know if they could have been helicopters searching the bay but they didn't seem like that to us. i have attached a picture that came from the video i took. it is of one of the objects when it is orange. i have about 10 minutes of hd video of them, although it gets pretty shaky at times.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 orange orbs..Changed to bright white, irregular shape, with flashing lights on side

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
Looking out my window admiring the beautiful colors of the clouded sunset i decided to snap a few shots to use as my wallpaper. after a few shots i realized there was something in the sky above the tree line. i zoomed my cell in as far as i could and started snapping away. the clouds were moving right and this dark grey saucer looking object appeared out of them hovering in place, or so it seemed. at first i thought it was just a darker cloud mixing with the prettier light colored ones. starring at it through my camera i could tell it was solid. looking over the photos later i could clearly see that it was slooooooooowly moving against the clouds. the time was 8:26pm and it was gone by 8:29pm. i snapped 26 pictures in that time period. about 5-7minutes later i was on the phone explaining to my bestie what i saw. sure enough as i was describing it to her this big huuuuge dark diamond shaped looking cloud started popping out of the clouds. i stared in awe at how massive it was. it wasn't one solid object. it was several small round, dark gray objects. they slowly started moving across the sky, same direction as clouds this time. a sudden bright flash of light and they shot of in two opposite directions. my son and his father were also starring at this unexplained phenomenon. i would have loved to have got that one on video or pictures. but can't use camera while im talking on my phone, that happens to be camera. lol. i was disappointed i didn't get the big one recorded but i am happy i got the smaller one. i have several over sightings. i live near the airport in roanoke so i see planes go out all the time, along with helicopters. and what i have witnessed the last two months were nothing that has come out of that airport. i can see the planes land and take off. im so close i hear them start up constantly. all 8 sighting this past month were not planes, birds, balloons or anything i have seen on this planet. 
i have also included two more photos of 3 round objects in the clouds near airport. if you look above the airport sign near top of photo you will see them in a triangle like shape. might have to zoom. one is the original and one is cropd to show them a little better. they are not birds. there is a bird in the photo but the three objects together are not.
i have seen orbs. stationary, blinking different colors really fast, flashes then vanished.
orange orbs that just zip across the sky and change direction too quickly and sharply to be plane, meteor or shooting start. no trails were left by either.
seen weird round objects in the clouds above airport and mountains.
grey, gun metal type colored saucer flew 20ft above our heads( had 4 people over camping in my backyard) on april 20th @ 11:13pm. made no sound, had no lights and wasn't very big. it actually shocked me on how small it was. it wasnt tiny, at first we thought it was an owl gliding through the sky. that was about the size, an adult owl with wings wide open. but it wasn't an owl, i can promise you that. 
every time i see one of these objects i can't explain, i smile. im not scared during  any of these sightings. im relieved that im not crazy. i know there's no way we are the only living being in the whole universe. im glad they are making themselves known and i can't wait to actually get to chill with beings who have so much to offer mankind. happy hunting everyone. peace. :-)
content.summary: Dark grey large solid object hovering and fading in and out of clouds

content.detailedDescription: While i was sitting in the hot tub i noticed a large bright light in the western sky. i watched it head in a nw below the treeline. it was far off in the sky and slow moving but faster than star. it significantly larger than any start more than 5 times then size of anything in the sky. all the stars moved in a more regular western heading. this had a different heading. it passed other stars which blocked them out. i checked the space station website to verify that it was not it the flight path. several airplane went by in other areas but near the bright light. this light dwarfed the planes in comparison. i do have photos since the object was slow moving. the photos were taken on my phone so are of poor quality.
content.summary: Large bright light with nw heading

content.summary: Large bright light with nw heading

content.detailedDescription: Saw this last week and again tonight - a single bright object in sf bay area skies to the north-northwest as viewed from san ramon ca.  tried to look at it with binoculars, which were difficult to steady.  object was moving north or northeast, so it became lower on the horizon as i watched.  light was too bright and moved too fast to be a star.  if i had to narrow down the description, i'd say i was watching flames from the back of a rocket of some kind - bright white to yellowish white, but red at the trailing end.  if it was flames from a rocket, i could not see the rocket itself.  last week's sighting was at about 9 pm and it was farther west; tonight around 10 pm it was farther north.  the international space station does occasionally pass overhead, but it only stays visible for a few minutes at a time, so this object was not the iss.  never saw anything in the newspapers last week about such a sighting.
content.summary: Bright light/object north-northwest from bay area skies

content.detailedDescription: While watching the avengers on opening night at the drive-in,myself and several witness noticed a bright white/orange non-blinking light silently drop down and hover at treetop level at the small mtn. range located directly behind the movie screen. while we were watching it,the light just...Faded into nothing. one second it was there and then it was just gone.
content.summary: While watching a movie at the twin city drive-in,myself and several witness' notcied a bright white/orange light silently drop down and hover over the treetop mtn. range directly behind the drive-in movie screen. after a few minutes,the light just faded

content.detailedDescription: Please call for more info
content.summary: Square object with 4 bright lights flew right by house at 10:22 pm after helicpoters flew around one with search light. ufo was not very fast los to ground and silent

content.detailedDescription:
I had just been dismissed from my journalism class, so i went behind woodburn hall to sit down and smoke a cigarette. the day was calm and partly cloudy. absolutely no wind.

something in the distance - over the building on the hill across the mon river - reflected the sun's light. i saw a white object seemingly hovering and moving back and forth. it was almost spinning if i remember correctly. i watched, trying to figure out what it was. i thought "is that a bag?" what bag acts like that? a balloon? but it was just hanging there..

i realized i had my own personal camera, a nikon d40x, and proceeded to try to get a good picture of it, as far as my lens would allow. the object then started to slowly and steadily rise in a straight line. it did this until i lost sight of it. it periodically reflected light - or emitted its own light - until it just vanished in the blue of the sky.

the photos provided have been processed so that colors contrast greater and so that the object in question is clearer than before. the variations in white balance are just that - me messing with my white balance trying to get a good shot of the object.
content.summary: Object seen hovering over building on hill - ascended steadily until gone
